font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 反抗权威的人：a person who rebels against any authority, established order, or ruling power
【同】rebel, insurgent
【派】 anarchy n. 混乱 ： a state of lawlessness or political disorder due to the absence of governmental authority
【近】chaos, disarray, topsy-turviness, commotion, turmoil
【反】order 有序
【记】 anarchy无政府的
